content: Why does bors get so many spurious network errors? E.g. https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/79780#issuecomment-739907994

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/best-practices/transient-faults

However, the nature of these environments can mean that transient faults are more likely to occur.

See the rest of the page for more info why exactly.
Thanks! I'll take a look at that.
